title: Twisted Fate's E doesn't have a sound at latest patch.
body: I just played Twisted Fate for a few games and realised he doesn't have that voice effect of laugh when E is ready.I have been playing Tf since season 4 so it effects my gameplay too.Just need to learn that is a bug or is a patch difference.

replies.body:
Hey WorldWkeend! 

Thanks for the report! ^-^ 

We're aware of the issue and are working on a fix! This isn't something affecting your client personally, it's an issue on our end.
Thanks for the reply.Hope you fix it :)
